SectionDescription: Showcase of projects done during the second and third semesters at NID, Bengaluru in the Interaction Design course.
Showcase of projects done during the first semester at NID, Bengaluru in the Interaction Design course and as a designer in my own practice.
Showcase of projects done prior to joining NID, Bengaluru. At this time, I worked primarily as an architect but also did some graphic and web design in my own practice.
